description:
Previously in Chronicles of Vampires, Linda Hyde discovered a supernatural conspiracy threatening the world. Because of her unique gift, only she can prevent the awakening of primal evil. She must halt the sequence of events that together will unleash demonic destruction upon all mankind! Guide Linda as she moves between the worlds of people and vampires as you explore chilling locations, uncover hidden objects, and solve mind bending puzzles. Defeat the conspiracy of wicked creatures and rescue humanity by uncovering the shocking truth in the final episode of Chronicles of Vampires!

Features:
*Enter a secret world of vampires. Immerse yourself into the captivating Hidden Object Adventure in the world of vampires.
*Race against time to stop this sinister plot in this exciting adventure!
*Challenging puzzles and mind-bending minigames. It's up to you to find the clues and put the pieces together.
*Over 20 locations to explore and over 200 Hidden Objects to find.
